LanguageData.WoW_Animal_Unicorn.label: 独角兽
LanguageData.WoW_Animal_Unicorn.description: Unicorns are a species of horse-like creatures living on Azeroth and who, unlike horses, have a horn growing out of their head. The Quel'dorei steed are descended from a fine line of horses that once grazed near the shores of the Well of Eternity
LanguageData.WoW_Animal_Unicorn.tools.1.label: 角
LanguageData.WoW_Animal_Unicorn.tools.2.label: 左蹄
LanguageData.WoW_Animal_Unicorn.tools.3.label: 右蹄
